Задумка очень интересная и сам идея свежая ,похожих игр просто нет.Игра мне очень нравится,но баги...
Эта игра я считаю лучшая в своем жанре. В нее интересно играть как с друзьями, так и в рандоме.
Снимаешь три раза с крюка, лечишь двоих затем заводишь 3 генератора и начинаешь открывать ворота. В этот момент игра крашится и вместо 20К очков ты получаешь штраф на рейтинг.
游戏可以。就是BUG不少。希望官方赶快完善。这游戏和朋友玩效果更佳。
Bon jeu, bien équilibré, fun en coop. Ambiance et gameplay trés agréable.
Игра супер! Правда мало в неё по ка что поиграл не всё опробовал так сказать) но задумка классная буду надеяться что игра будет дальше развиваться!

Ho giocato un po ed ecco le mie impressioni:
CONTRO (Cose realmente accadute)
1. Dopo l'ultima patch l'hanno rovinato, sbilanciamento assurdo.
2.Ci sono un casino di bug e glitch ovvero:
-Survivor e killer che muovono gli arti in modo del tutto anormalo (glitch grafici)
-Il killer che fa la verticale sui muri (Sono d'accordo tenersi in forma ma...no dai!)
-Il killer incastrato tra il pallet che non può difendersi (diciamo basta al maltrattamento dei killer! sotto la maschera sono persone come noi!)
-Survivor che avvolte volano a random (letteralmente, i can fly) pallet che rimangono in verticale (anche i pallet hanno una vita sessuale a quanto pare) e non possono essere usati.
-Animazioni buggate sul gancio, ne vedrete spesso, quando un vostro amico vi libera ma magari comincia il divincolamento sul gancio, (quello dove dovrete premere spazio ripetutamente per intenderci) vedrete voi a terra e a tratti sarete sul gancio a morire totalmente a no sense.
-Matchmaking fatto a cavolo, avete giocato 2 ore? avete 1 perk? il miglior abbinamento che vi capiterà sarà gente con  300 ore e 4 perk, idem per il killer.
Vi domanderete? ma perche? semplice, perche ti mette in base al rank (1-20) e indovinate un po, il rank si resetta mensilmente ma non leva i perk e abilità guadagnati, quindi se voi cominciate a giocare e siete (20) con 2 ore di gioco, troverete anche gente di 300 ore rank (20) per via del reset e avranno tutte le abilità, indovinate come andrà a finire che siate killer o survivor, sarà sbilanciatissima la partita.
-Cosa? un oggetto che ti permette di uccidere tutti survivors basta che li prendi e fai "kill"? e la partita dove va a finire?
-Cosa? un oggetto che ti permette di riparare istantaneamente un generatore? e la sfida di ripararli? e se l' oggetto in questione lo prendono 4 survivors il killer che fa apre l'uscita o scappa dalla botola? (Ebbene si ragazzi, anche i killer possono perdere il lavoro, c'è crisi!)
-La lobby delle volte crasha, altra volte devi provare 10 volte a cercare una partita per trovarne finalmente una (consiglio di fare sopravvivi con amici che ve la trova prima la partita, senza un reale motivo)
-i caricamenti avvolta si bloccano e per sempre, vedrete il logo di caricamento caricare per l'eternità, la soluzione? Ebbene, un antica leggenda narra di una pressione di tasti sulla tastiera, tale usanza è detta "altabbare" e permette di uscire dalla morsa del gioco forzatamente (ALT+F4).
-Lag e controlag! il killer mi colpisce anche dopo i pallet e delle volte scatto a destra e a sinistra senza motivo, ma perche? la mia connessione và come può essere?
semplice, deadbydaylight utilizza connessioni p2p ovvero il killer hosta tutte le partite, se il killer lagga, laggano tutti e indovinate a chi va a sfavore la cosa? esatto ai survivors perche vengono colpiti anche dopo i pallet o finiscono su trappole non volendo o sbagliano i qte per la confusione.
E ovviamente non esiste un modo per risolvere il problema, niente tacchette stile wi-fi per capirci qualcosa, niente ping, sarebbe stato carino che quando il killer ti scopre ti urla il suo ping dovrebbero aggiungerlo, non perdiamo tempo a risolvere i bug che tanto nessuno lo nota no? Cmq l'unico consiglio che posso darvi è di scrivere sulla chat della lobby mentre siete in attesa che tutti siano pronti, vi darà una mezza e grezza idea della connessione del killer.
-Se potesse fa una partita senza qualcosa che non funzioni o si bugghi o si glicci.
-Unreal engine usato male, (dai guardate friday 17 the game e trovatemi le differenze)
-P.S. (Quando micheal il killer, vi appende ad un gancio, fateci caso la parte del corpo dove dovrebbe stare la cintura gli si restringe senza motivo xD)

PRO
-L'idea è figa, l'atmosfera alla fine c'è e quando tutto funziona (quasi mai) è divertente, per questo mi incazzo, ha del potenziale il gioco ma è mal sfruttato.
-Bella la cooperazione tra survivors, il salvarsi il non salvarsi, scappare non scappare, diciamo che l'ansia è presente in certi momenti.
-Bello il sistema di avanzamento dei singoli killer e survivor, con tanti oggetti, abilità e quantaltro per i singoli, specialmente i killer
-Il sonoro non sembra male, almeno credo, non sono un esperto ma mi è sembrato direzionale e ben realizzato, fatemi sapere se mi sbaglio.

Ci sarebbe molto altro da dire ma penso che basti questo, spero che queste mie esperienze oltre ad avervi dato un idea dello stato del gioco, vi facciano capire che secondo me per ora non vale l'acquisto, troppo sbilanciato, troppi bug e troppo ozio degli sviluppatori.
Ricordo che questa è solo un opinione, saluti!

Игрушка довольно весёлая но со временем может надоесть, графика средняя но можно было и лучше, много багов, самый основной это естественно с поиском игры, нужно часто жать на поиск иначе выдает ошибку, жду фикса, с серверами у меня часто происходит десинхрон (возможно это не только у меня).

Very average, clunky and unfinished game. As someone who loves horror movies and games I had to buy it and see for myself since the reviews were mixed but after no more than 2 hours all I feel is disapointment and boredom. 
Do yourself a favor and check 15 min gameplay on YT and I guarantee you this is all you'll see in the game. Stale gameplay and no tension.

Update: After going back to it in 2021 and playing around 30h I had great fun and decided to buy all DLC :D Great game now, a lot of bad stuff was updated and there is a good choice of both Killers and Survivors. Defo get it on sale with all the DLC, worth it!

Dead by Daylight - это когда при покупке Deluxe ты получаешь Soundtrack и ArtBook бесплатно.

Dead by Daylight - это когда при покупке Deluxe в игре ты ничем не отличаешься от других. 

Dead by Daylight - это когда маньяк в начале раунда через всю карту идет на тебя.

Dead by Daylight - это когда игра не запускается в полном окне и из-за этого у тебя на 10-15 фпс меньше.

Dead by Daylight - это когда разработчики не могут добавить настройки экрана чтобы поставить полноэкранный режим.

Dead by Daylight - это когда благодаря плохому интернету можно телепортироватся на другой конец карты от маньяка.

Dead by Daylight - это когда при запуске игры е***й маньяк ливает с неё и ранг всех игроков понижается.

Dead by Daylight - это когда есть классные маньяки которые дают пофармить тебе и ты ему, а есть ху****ы которые повесив жертву на крюк стоят около неё.

Dead by Daylight is a 4V1 hide and seek game themed after slasher horror movies. The four survivors try to escape the game map. The killer trys to catch the survivors and sacrifice them to his dark god. I love this game. But it is seriously flawed.

 It has glitches that should have been fixed in the beta testing. Sometimes you run into invisible walls which, if you are playing as a survivor, can get you caught and killed and if you are the killer, can make you lose what should have been easy quary. When playing as the killer, sometimes the game won't let you turn, that is, it doesn't register the movement of your mouse and rotate your view accordingly, which can easily prevent you from seeing survivors who are right next to you or let someone who you are chasing get away. One player disconecting can ruin the game for everyone. For the survivors, it means less people to help you complete objectives, distract the killer, or rescue you from them. For the killer, its actually materially beneficial since it counts as a sacrifice, thats 1250 points, for them. So the killer can win the game without actually having to catch and sacrifice anyone, which hardly seems fair. Worst of all, since the killers' have to host the game, the killer quiting means that everyone else gets booted from the game without getting any points. So developers, please create dedicated servors so that the killer dropping out doesn't prevent the survivors from getting credit. The biggest problem with the basic design is the leveling system. The way points are distributed means that you can actually get a better score and more resources for the next map by deliberately ignoring your objectives and stretching the game out for as long as possible to complete tasks that give you leveling points without actually advancing the objectives.

 So why do I reccomend this game? Because of its striking originality and presentation. When playing as a survivor, you know that you are being hunted down by a real human being who is capable of sadism and cruelty, and you are unable to fight back in any way. That is scarier than most things in most horror games and movies. As a killer, you get to act out the ultimate violent power fantasy, hunt people down like animals, and kill them in the bloodiest, most drawn out way possible. Most importantly, the mechanics being assymetrical and imposing imperfect information on both sides, means that there is more potential for something unexpected happening than in most games. So you really have to be able to think on your feet, improvise, misdirect your opponent, and read their intentions intuitively to be effective in this game. I have A.D.D. and an intuitive personality type. So this game actually allows me to play to my natural strengths.

 In summation, this game has problems. But they are all technical issues, and technical issues can be fixed. The core mechanics are delightfully novel in a way that makes you wonder why we haven't gotten something similar before. As flawed as this game is, get it anyway. There is nothing else like it on the market right now.

When I got this game, I was pretty excited. One of the coolest concepts I have ever seen, sorta like a mature L4D promising actual adrenaline and the thrill of an invincible murderer. This was also like Amnesia where survivors' hopes in escaping is poisoned with how powerful the killer is.

Reality was actually how I thought it would be. There were many chases and scenes, period of times where my (real-life) heart beat as fast avatar's in the game.

I recommend this game because despite the bugs and the current unbalanced state, it's still damn fun.

[b] Now, my warning. [/b] It IS buggy. The game is like a really handsome/sexy individual you wanna date. Only thing is he or she has like an IQ of 80. Perhaps you are just gunning for the looks department here, so I guess you might want to date him or her anyway.

Dead by Daylight is like that. There are going to be some of you looking for a fully optimised game like Overwatch. Even if the game has a cool concept, maybe you ain't gonna have fun as long as the game is still buggy. 

[i] That's totally fine. [/i]

For people who haven't yet BOUGHT the game, I am just gonna list the current MAJOR bugs/annoyance. I hope it will help in making your decision.



[u] PROS [/u]
It's sorta like a multiplayer Amnesia. You can't fight off the killer so you escape, you hide. This concept of being in a hopeless horror game IS FUCKING FUN. The thrill is amazing. All the dopamine and adrenaline like a drug that gets me high. And you live and die- then right to the next game where you can do it again. The perks you can get(passive abilities) also really changes the game so it gets really fun when you get them. You feel the significance of it helping you, really aiding and changing YOUR STYLE of escaping the killer.

You wanna be a team helping aura survivor? Sure. Someone that can sabotaged the killer's stuff? Why not? How about someone more individualistic. You ain't gonna help anyone so your perks are just for you to move faster and quieter? Hell yeah. There are many styles and perks. It's fun to actually experiment with them. 

Have the killer caught someone? You have to make a choice now- do you want to risk your live saving the nimcompoop or just try selfishly by yourself to make an escape? It's your life, your choice. And you will be scared while making that choice. 





[u]CONS[/u] [List]
[*]It's damn buggy. Some minor, some major. You know how you click a button ONCE in other games to queue? Then you sit back, relax and wait till you enter a game? Ain't like that here. You gotta click it a couple of times. It will still only take you a couple of clicks- but there might be time periods where you gotta click more. So yeah- you click to queue. And then after awhile, you might have to CLICK again. And again.


[*] There are exploits to be used- I guess this is a subset of buggyness but I am just gonna explain as another point. You can still win as survivors and killers but there ARE exploits. To me, I feel they ain't being abused that much so it's still alright. Mods are also trying to fix them every patch- and since the game came out, it's WAAAY better. Still, if you hate the very concept and don't have much tolerance for them then yeah okay- maaaaaybe not your thing.

[*] Might feel the game is a tad unbalanced. As every patch nerfs and buffs the killers and survivors, there is a meta. Where a certain killer/survivor is OP and everyone uses them. Yeah this exist. But honestly, most games have this "meta-complain".

[/list]



In conclusion, I still advise you guys to get it. The raw fun I get is too damn great. And I am sure the game will improve into a more optimised state(give the mods some time- they are a pretty small studio).

Excellent game, very intense and the procedural generation makes the game feel new enough and different that it doesn't get stale fast. As the devs add more maps, killers, and survivors, the game will only get better.

Of course, at the moment there are some bugs, but in my opinion the good far outweighs the bad here. Game well worth the full price of $20.

The game has been great for the 4 years ive owned it some of the things the devs have done have been questionable but ive bought most of the content only a few dlcs I dont own because both the survivor and killer are meh and not the best. I do recommend buying this game but expect to get shit on for a while until you learn as survivor how to loop a killer and mindgame and as killer how to mindgame survivors, get better at controlling gens which I hate to say it but you need dlc killers it feels like because some of the perks will help a lot from some of the dlc survivors/killers which you're not forced to buy them it does give you a little advantage in a few games for example decisive  strike from The Halloween dlc. Its a great perk for survivors which as killer you almost run into 1 person who uses it a game. In the end I do recommend this game to anyone who is looking for time to kill every so often and just have fun sometimes.

EDIT::  3/21/17-  Came back to this game after some time had passed.  In the last week I have played twice as many hours as I ever have before.   My recommendation for this game is now a confident thumbs up.  I have left the original review below, and I will breifly line out what has changed. 

Cons were corrected:

-Performance has greatly improved, and there are far fewer bugs.
-There are now customizable controls for both controller and mouse&keyboard.

Pros added:

-One new killer, two new survivors, and several maps added as free content, with even more available as DLC purchases. 


Cons added:
-There are a lot of toxic people in the community.  It's not quite leage of legends level of salt, and there are good people, too, but the loudest voices are always the ones whining and pointing fingers. 

::END EDIT:::

This is one of those rare times when I wish Steam offered a sideways thumb option on their reviews, and not just thumb up or down. 

After much deliberation, I decided to give this game a "recommend" for one simple reason: I enjoy this game, and will continue to play it.

That being said, there's plenty not to like.

Pros: 
- A refreshing new slant on the asymetrical pvp genre.
- Recognizable tropes from the horror genre, a compelling soundtrack, and artful level design really capture the feel of the campy slasher films which inspired the game. 
- The three different killers currently available are diverse, and intuitive. Each one is an homage to an iconic slasher pigeonhole, and function as you would expect, having watched a few horror flicks. 
- The objectives are simple to understand, but difficult to master.  You can jump right in and learn to play in just a few short games, and then spend quite some time advancing your characters and practicing different strategies. 

Cons: 
- A few persistent bugs, performance is greatly improved from a few months ago. 
- Survivors are like cookie-cutter copies of each other at low levels, each one playing exactly the same as the others until you unlock more advanced perks and items. 


All of this comes together to create a game experience that, while entertaining, feels like early access, but isn't.

Ran through a cornfield dodging a chainsaw weilding maniac, wiggled off a meat-hook, and then I was finally able to get home and play this game.

Pros:
- Creepy horror movie vibe
- PVP stealth gameplay that's always intense
- Lots of perks (skills) and builds to keep things fresh
- Active developers 
- Cool concept

Cons:
- Very grindy. If you want to try a specific set of perks be prepared for 200+ hours of grinding
- Somewhat toxic community due to the some people only playing one of the two roles

This game is fantastic. A lot of votes for it are for problems that have been fixed already in recent patches. Hours of fun for only $20. Extremely fun if you've got 4 other friends to play with, just as good with fewer IMO. 

People complain about balance issues- but really this game feels plenty balanced to me, with maybe the killers having a slightly higher advantage (but only slightly). Even so - I have loads of fun with this game. I've sunk over 50 hours into the game now- and you might too. 

It's not for everyone - but it's damn good fun.

unbalanced af. killers can kill you through walls and are way too OP (especially that invisible guy). sometimes you even spawn next to them and the game is lost bc there is no way to espace them bc their running speed is 100 times faster than yours so you are pretty much rip after you have been seen. Also almost every game is laggy and it takes years to join a lobby. the game feels like a pre alpha game and i just cant understand how they are allowed to take 20€ for this.
All these problems are known for quite some time but either the devolpers are not interessted in fixing this game or they just dont have the skill to make a working game idk.

This game used to be good but now the recent patch's has made it near on impossible for survivors. Back before the patch's your only worry was if the killer would camp your body if he caught you... Now its if you destroy one hook there's 3 more next to you, Oh and that one grows back within 40 seconds. Sabotaging hooks used to be viable now its a waste of time. Leading back to the killer camping your body, they don't get any penalties for it. But a survivor can't vault over the same object so many times. 1 year later game is still unbalanced as hell in killers favour (only recommend this game to play friends) unless you want easy mode playing as the killer boring

5 years after my first review and this game is basically still in the same state.  Just tons of content added.  Tons of bugs and glitches.  Can be extremely frustrating at times.  Don't bother picking the game up unless you have friends to guide you along the way.  Way too many perks/killers to learn how to play against.  At this point the lack of any other options for this game style and the insane grind for bloodpoints is the only thing keeping me playing.
The SWF mode is broken af but if I am playing solo it is still a good game. Fun and exciting, it will get your pulse up a bit.

If this was 2007 or 2008 it would have been a cool game with a cool idea that was pulled off poorly. Today the game is shit, littered with bugs despite being several patches after release(some of these bugs have been around since beta), after 1.5 hours of playing the game with 2 friends I've managed to play 3 games and spent the majority of the team in the lobby pressing ready over and over. The ranked system is very flawed (instead of encouraging teammates to co-operate to win it encourages people to be selfish to gain points in order to rank up/avoid deranking). 
The level design is very poor and lazy but hey at least the sound design is cool I guess. Avoid buying it full price or anything above 10€. I bought it to play a fun horror game with my friends but we've barely been able to play together due to the super flawed matchmaking system.

63 hours in as of 8/2/2016:

20%+ of the games you play as killer will end in a crash and give you the nice "please report what happened" box while at the same time taking away hard earned points and rank. This has happened 17 times in the last 3 days. Not 1, not 2, not 5, SEVENTEEN. The highlight of the bunch so far is that 9 minutes into a game, with 2 survivors dead, 2 injured and chasing one of those 2 down, player #5 enters the game! Yup. Nine minutes in and another player joined the game, and of course promptly crashed. Got that one recorded on video. This is all over the forums. 

Because this game is Peer-hosted, upwards of 20-30% of the games you enter as a survivor will be met with a killer who is running either a hardware of software lag-switch whereby they selectively raise their ping or interrupt their connection resulting in you, the survivor, being dead or injured or warping around while they go on un-impeded. This is blatantly obvious when everything is fine until you see the killer chasing someone and suddenly like magic, everyone starts warping, running into walls. When that person is dead, oh wow, look, its just fine until you guessed it, killer is on someone else. This is also all over the forums.

If you want to play with friends, be prepared for the following to happen:

Start the game in your little group, hit ready annnnd. no game found. At this point you have to hit "ready again" annnnnd. no game found. You will repeat this for 1-6 minutes, hitting "ready" each time and starting the search over again. When you do finally join a game often that will end before it ever starts because either the killer is way too low with zero perks and doesn't want to be juked out by 3 rank 1, prestige 2 survivors with no real hope, or he wants to farm easy groups, or one of the other survivors leaves because they just want to hatch camp and hide in a closet until you do all the work, or they don't want to play with lower (or higher) ranked people. You guessed it, forums are full of posts like this.

If you make it past the crashes and lost points, the lag-switching hosts, the lost lobbies and the random drop outs, some of the games you get in to will be enjoyable. 

The perks/offerings/maps are interesting and although some maps still have what are called "infinite loops" where a survivor can simply run around a long hall and hop through a window long before the killer can get them, they are not as prevalent as early launch.

In it's current state, this is simply not something I would recommend at this time, it is beyond frustrating.

Dead by daylight это хорор , стелс и онлайн игра ! В неё можно играть с друзьями как за маньяка так и за выжевших ! Её обнавляют и вносят исправления , ведь видно разработчики следят и лелеют эту игру . Dead by daylight ждёт большое будущее !!!

Nach einigen Monaten Spielzeit und vielen zugeschauten Stunden im Stream habe ich mittlerweile eine positive Verbesserung im Spiel vernommen. Survive with Friends läuft jetzt eindeutig bugfreier. Man verliert zwar trotzdem noch manchmal die Verbindung zur Lobby aber es ist bei weitem nicht so schlimm wie im Anfangsstadium. Man hat zwar immernoch lange Wartezeiten je nach Downloadregion und Größe der Survive with Friends Lobby aber das ist okay, DBD kann ja nichts dafür wenn gerade keine Lobby die passende Größe für meine Gruppe hat. Auch die Ingame bugs treten kaum noch auf (ich habe leider das Pech momentan das ich die mitgenommenen Gegenstände öfters mal nicht benutzen kann und auch nicht ablegen kann :S aber das ist eigtl okay).

Die paar Bugs sind allerdings nicht störend (ja ich weiß, es gibt leute die heftigere und öfters bugs haben). Was störend ist sind die ganzen Facecamper im game die eine Rettung unmöglich machen oder generell jede Art von Spiel sobald man einmal gefangen wird. Dies resultiert meistens dann in einen Derank, weil nur Generatoren machen nicht immer ausreichend ist.... Zumindest sind das dann die Leute die sich "cool" fühlen und dann am Ende der Runde irgendeinen Bullshit labern müssen in den Endchat. Es wäre super wenn DBD noch irgendetwas machen könnte das Facecampen und generelles Campen richtig unlukrativ machen würde. Moment kriegen die Camper ja trotzdem noch nen pip, wenn sie eine einzige Person richtig facecampen...
Ein weiterer negativer Punkt sind die Hosts. Ich weiß ja nicht in welchem Urwald manche Leute leben aber meine Güte, man geht gefühlt einen Schritt vorwärts und portet sich auf einmal quer durch die halbe Map so groß sind die lags manchmal. Richtige Server von DBD könnten dem wahrscheinlich Einhalt gebieten.

An sich macht das Spiel allerdings sehr viel Spaß. Meine Freunde und ich haben schon viele witzige Momente in diesem Spiel erlebt und spielen es immer wieder gerne. Nur Camper rauben einem dann etwas die Spiel Lust. 

DBD kriegt eine 7 / 10 für die guten Momente und die Verbesserungen seit Release. Die restlichen 3 Punkte kriegen sie wenn sie es schaffen das weniger Leute so hart campen das man niemanden mehr helfen kann und wenn sie die restlichen bugs entfernen und irgendwann mal eigene Server erstellen (auch wenn mir das rumlaggen manchmal spaß macht, weil der Killer 10x an einem vorbei schlägt :D )

This game gives an all new meaning to Git Gud. The matchmakeing is bad, like REALLY bad. Fortunately the learning curve isn't too hard.

As for the game itself... Its fun, more so than you would think. You will run the emotional gauntlet from VERY angry to laughing like a dang fool.

I would recomend this game if your looking for something truly unique in a multiplayer game.

Игрушка классная. Многие говорят что играя за маньяка все выжившие хотят что при повешении сурва ты должен уйти в другой край карты  и ждать пока их снимут и далее и далее и далее. Боже люди, вы серьезно????Да кемпить повешенных и червяков,тунелить раненых и прочее это плохо. Но объясню таким маньяк которые жалуются что сурвы пишут предъявы на счет кемпинга и тунелинга. 
1.Кемпинг. 
Это когда  ты пасешь повешенного выжившего или лежачего и не даешь его спасти. Это плохо и так не интересно.Так же есть фейскемпинг, думаю понятно что это. Так вот. То что вы думаете что сурвы жалуются что вы должны отходить за край карты это тупо, это сугубо ваше понимание. Вы просто должны повесить и уйти дальше продолжать играть(ломать генеры, ловить другого выжившего, ставить капканы если вы трапер и прочее).Конечно если вы видите в 3-4 метрах от крюка выжившего и бегаете за ним то это не кемпинг. Теперь на счет кемпинга червячков. Даже если у вас нет агитации или граспа, попытайтесь донести сурва до крюка. Потому что кемпить червячков это не круто. Опят же вы лишаете как себя так и сурвов хорошо поиграть и заработать бп очки. 
2. Тунелинг
Это когда вы бегаете за одним и тем же выжившим, в особенности если он ранен. Тоесть вы повесили одного, его сняли вы успели подбежать и видите например троих и вы видите раненого и бежите за ним снова бьете и вешаете. Это конечно не сильно вызывает бомбалейло и вроде как логично что легче за раненым бегать, но если вы бегаете почти всю игру за одним и тем же раненым не смотря на окружающих которые пытаются вас блочить, то это тупо и не интересно. Во первых потому что он может размансить вас пока остальные чинят генеры и вы всрете капельку.А во вторых это просто нудно и надоедает.

Игрушка просто классная, выходят новые маньяки и сурвы ,появляются новые тактики и прочее. Не надо портить игру сплошным фейскемпингом,абузами и прочим дерьмицом.

The point of the game isn't to escape or kill everybody, its to maximize the amount of points you get in each category, and yes escaping or sacrificing helps a ton. With my limited playing time as a main killer and watching videos of rank 1 killers, I can say that if the killer just camps survivors once he hooks them he wont get as many points as he would if he were to chase them around, lose them, find them, repeat. two hits and a sacrifice is a lot less points then finding, chasing, and losing people throughout the game. Yes camping the hook screws over the survivors but it doesn't actually benefit the killer as much as most think.

I personally haven't encountered many of the bugs others are complaining about so as far as I know this is a great game, that I thoroughly enjoy and would recommend to anybody who enjoys a thrill.

The game is terribly unbalanced and buggy. The matchmaking works maybe once out of every ten times you try it and when it does you are matched with people who are beyond your skill level who use perks that make the game not enjoyable.

This game is incredibly fun. I have fun as both the killer and the survivor. That said, something needs to be done about losing 3 pips when steam goes down for 5 minutes or the game crashes. It's incredibly hard to rank up as a survivor in the first place, I dont need horseshit like that happening on top of it.

This game needs to get better, killers just constantly camping. Devs please bring in some updates for survivors to be able to defend themselves better. the flashlight could blind the killer for longer!

These developers make changes that nobody likes or asks for, with each update comes bugs that degrade any kind of value the updates have, and what do they do about it? NOTHING. I played a lot in the past, cause it was great in its older days when it was still fresh and exciting, but now this version dreams of being as great as it was in the past. I'm tired of the developers blatantly disregarding valid opinions, brushing off the opinions of disabled gamers(the colorblind situation), and truthfully I feel betrayed after all the time I've spent playing this game. Not worth it, if they went back like 2 years then maybe I'd recommend it.

Matchmaking system has to be improved, killers and survivors have to be matched according to a short range between ranks. How is a ranked 1 killer matched against a bunch of ranked 20s survivors or vice versa fair?

No doubt it's a fairly new game, bugs and glitches are understandable.

Ich mag das Spielkonzept gern, sonst hätte ich nicht fast 1000 Stunden zusammen. Leider überwiegen die negativen Punkte, weshalb ich das Game weiterhin nicht empfehlen kann. Wäre es möglich, würde ich neutral bewerten. Die bisherigen Updates haben kaum Verbesserungen gebracht. Es muss eine Menge Bugfixing betrieben werden!

Hier eine Überarbeitung meiner Review, wobei sich einige Kritikpunkte trotz Updates bis heute gehalten haben:

1) Allein findet man leicht eine Lobby. Zu zweit wird es schwieriger. Zu viert ist es eine Geduldsprobe. Es vergehen gut 20 Minuten, in der eine Lobby gesucht wird.

1a) Der Netzwerkfehler, den man als Lobbyführer bekommt, sollte mit dem letzten Update gefixt sein. Er ist jedoch noch immer vorhanden. Gerade haben wir zu dritt innerhlb von 90 Minuten gerade mal drei Spiele machen können. Es ist schlichtweg unspielbar geworden.

1b) Hat man zu viert eine Killer-Lobby gefunden, passiert es nicht selten, dass man während des Match-Makings von seinen Freunden getrennt wurde. Zwei sind in einer Lobby, zwei in einer anderen. Also noch mal von vorn.

2) Bugs noch und nöcher. Man bleibt hinter oder in Haken stecken, auf felsigem Boden oder in einer Palette und kann sich nicht selbst befreien. Erst der Killer kann einen im wahrsten Sinne des Wortes raushauen.

3) Was sich gebessert hat, sind die Perks der Überlebenden. So ist es z. B. möglich, sich mit „Unbeugsam“ von Bill selbst komplett hochzuheilen. Von dem Perk „Geliehene Zeit“ haben andere Mitspieler auch was.

4) Es passiert immer noch, dass man eigentlich jemanden vom Haken holen will und man stattdessen ein Item vom Boden aufhebt. Oder man möchte jemanden heilen und sabotiert stattdessen einen Haken. In den Update-News steht, die Auswahlschwierigkeiten wären gefixt, was leider nicht stimmt.

Verbesserungsvorschläge:

1) Die Lobby-Suche muss dringend überarbeitet werden!

2) Beim Match-Making könnten die bisherige Stundenanzahl des Spielers berücksichtigt werden.

3) Killer sollten nicht sehen dürfen, was Überlebende für Items mitnehmen. Eine Werkzeugkiste per Killer-Lobby wird meist geduldet, jede weitere erhöht jedoch die Gefahr, dass der Killer die Lobby schließt. Probiert es ruhig mal aus!

4) Wenn das Campen eines Killers eine erlaubte Spielweise darstellt, sollte das Verweilen an Ort und Stelle für die Überlebenden ebenfalls eine erlaubte Spielweise sein, die nicht bestraft wird, indem er eine Vogelhandlung aufmachen kann.

5) Für den Killer sollte es nicht ersichtlich sein, dass eine Truppe „Survive with friends“ spielt. Das bedeutet, der Beitritt der einzelnen Spieler in die Killer-Lobby sollte immer in einem Abstand von wenigen Sekunden geschehen, nicht auf einmal. 

Habe neulich gelesen, dass die Killer-Spieler im März gestreikt hätten. Ich lasse das mal so im Raum stehen …

Un concept intéressant qui laisse encore insatisfait.

Les -
L'équibrage des niveaux pour le matchmaking est absent. A mon sens, les concepteurs ont fait ici l'impasse sur un élément central du jeu.
On déplore la présence d'un système de progression régressif.
Le manque de personnalisation et de récompense sur les parties gagnées affecte négativement l'immersion dans le jeu et l'intérêt porté au jeu.
Un jeu où il est impossible d'empêcher les joueurs de tricher. Les joueurs échangent par en vocal alors que le jeu ne l'autorise pas dans ses règles. Ce qui est complètement broken.
Une seule solution consisterait à empêcher les parties en équipe mais ce n'est pas le cas. Du coup le jeu est cassé.

Les +
Une ambiance horreur au rendez-vous.
Une génération aléatoire de map toujours différente à chaque partie.
La possibilité de faire des parties privées entre amis.


Je recommande pour le fun ou pour satisfaire l'envie de meurtre ^^
